sourcesContent:
import React from "react" export default function PokeView(props) { let pokemon = props.pokemon return (

{props.pokemon.name}

{props.pokemon.type_1.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + props.pokemon.type_1.slice(1)} {props.pokemon.type_2 != "nil" && props.pokemon.type_1.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + props.pokemon.type_1.slice(1)}

HP: {props.pokemon.hp}

Attack: {props.pokemon.attack}

Defense: {props.pokemon.defense}

Special Attack: {props.pokemon.special_attack}

Special Defense: {props.pokemon.special_defense}

Speed: {props.pokemon.speed}

BST: {`${props.pokemon.hp + props.pokemon.attack + props.pokemon.defense + props.pokemon.special_attack + props.pokemon.special_defense + props.pokemon.speed}`}

) }
